00146 int nfs3_Fsinfo( nfs_arg_t               * parg,    
00147                  exportlist_t            * pexport, 
00148                  fsal_op_context_t             * pcontext,   
00149                  cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00150                  hash_table_t            * ht,
00151                  struct svc_req          * preq,    
00152                  nfs_res_t               * pres )
00153 {
00154         static char   __attribute__(( __unused__ ))     funcName[] = "nfs3_Fsinfo";
00155 
00156   cache_inode_status_t      cache_status ;
00157   cache_entry_t           * pentry = NULL ;
00158   cache_inode_fsal_data_t   fsal_data ;
00159   fsal_attrib_list_t        attr ;
00160   
00161   /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00162   pres->res_fsinfo3.FSINFO3res_u.resfail.obj_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00163 
00164   /* Convert file handle into a fsal_handle */
00165   if( nfs3_FhandleToFSAL( &(parg->arg_fsinfo3.fsroot), &fsal_data.handle, pcontext ) == 0 )
00166         return NFS_REQ_DROP;
00167 
00168   /* Set the cookie */
00169   fsal_data.cookie = DIR_START ;
00170 
00171   /* Get the entry in the cache_inode */
00172   if( ( pentry = cache_inode_get( &fsal_data, 
00173                                   &attr, 
00174                                   ht, 
00175                                   pclient, 
00176                                   pcontext, 
00177                                   &cache_status ) ) == NULL )
00178     {
00179       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00180       pres->res_fsinfo3.status = NFS3ERR_STALE ;
00181       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00182     }
00183   
00184   
00185         /*
00186          * New fields were added to nfs_config_t to handle this value. We use
00187          * them 
00188          */
00189 
00190 #define FSINFO_FIELD pres->res_fsinfo3.FSINFO3res_u.resok
00191         FSINFO_FIELD.rtmax  = pexport->MaxRead;
00192         FSINFO_FIELD.rtpref = pexport->PrefRead;
00193 
00194         /* This field is generally unused, it will be removed in V4 */
00195         FSINFO_FIELD.rtmult = DEV_BSIZE;
00196 
00197         FSINFO_FIELD.wtmax  = pexport->MaxWrite;
00198         FSINFO_FIELD.wtpref = pexport->PrefWrite;
00199 
00200         /* This field is generally unused, it will be removed in V4 */
00201         FSINFO_FIELD.wtmult = DEV_BSIZE;
00202 
00203         FSINFO_FIELD.dtpref = pexport->PrefReaddir ;
00204 
00205         FSINFO_FIELD.maxfilesize = FSINFO_MAX_FILESIZE;
00206         FSINFO_FIELD.time_delta.seconds = 1;
00207         FSINFO_FIELD.time_delta.nseconds = 0;
00208 
00209 #ifdef _DEBUG_NFSPROTO
00210         printf("rtmax = %d | rtpref = %d | trmult = %d\n",
00211                FSINFO_FIELD.rtmax, FSINFO_FIELD.rtpref, FSINFO_FIELD.rtmult = DEV_BSIZE);
00212         printf("wtmax = %d | wtpref = %d | wrmult = %d\n",
00213                FSINFO_FIELD.wtmax, FSINFO_FIELD.wtpref, FSINFO_FIELD.wtmult = DEV_BSIZE);
00214         printf("dtpref = %d | maxfilesize = %llu \n", FSINFO_FIELD.dtpref, FSINFO_FIELD.maxfilesize);
00215 #endif
00216 
00217 
00218         /*
00219          * Allow all kinds of operations to be performed on the server
00220          * through NFS v3 
00221          */
00222         FSINFO_FIELD.properties = FSF3_LINK | FSF3_SYMLINK | FSF3_HOMOGENEOUS | FSF3_CANSETTIME;
00223 
00224         nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00225                      pentry, 
00226                      &attr,
00227                      &(pres->res_fsinfo3.FSINFO3res_u.resok.obj_attributes));
00228         pres->res_fsinfo3.status = NFS3_OK;
00229 
00230 
00231         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00232 } /* nfs3_Fsinfo */
00233 
00234 
00243 void nfs3_Fsinfo_Free( nfs_res_t * pres )
00244 {
00245   /* Nothing to do */
00246   return ;
00247 } /* nfs3_Fsinfo_Free */
